testcase.name: Create new Company scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user has already logged in to application.............................passed Given user is on home page and verifies account name "Photon" and account user "Har Kris".passed When user moves to menu list and select add new company.....................passed Then user is on company page and verifies page title "Create new Company"...passed And user fills the form comapany name "Profilo" and website "www.profilo.com" and email "profilo@outlook.com".passed And user selects access as private and select username "Har Kris" from dropdown.passed Then user enters Address "patel" "Hyd" "Telangana" "500013".................passed Then user enters personal email "hari23@gmail.com" and Industry "Software pvd lmtd".passed And user enters data for description "Profilo software pvt lmtd" and no.of employees "10000".passed And user clicks on save button..............................................passed Then user verifies company name and quits...................................passed
